name: stone-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Rock moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Rock.
short_effect: Held: Rock-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Rock.

flavor_text.sword-shield: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
